author: jonesde
msg: Added quick first pass for the sendMailFromTemplateSetting service that uses the new EmailTemplateSetting entity; note that this is still beta as I haven't tested it much, but it shows that concept and can be a basis for further work, possibly including refactor of ProductStoreEmailSetting to use this entity and service but that isn't necessary for other things to use it, etc
